title: Drawing, June 2, 1892 ?
medium:
Recto: Graphite, brush and various watercolor washes on paper.
Verso: Graphite on paper.
signed: Signed with mongram, lower right corner.
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite ?, at upper right: The Needles; and dated: June 2 189. 
Verso: Inscribed in graphite: 82.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of distant jagged mountian peaks.
Verso: View of two peaks with a canyon wall in left background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, June 2, 1892 ?.
June 2, 1892 ?. Recto: Graphite, brush and various watercolor washes on paper.
Verso: Graphite on paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-18.
